about_the_game:
Dive into the enchanting world of Scrapbooking, where imagination knows no bounds! 🌟

📖 What awaits you in Scrapbooking?
📌 Unlimited Creativity: Let your imagination run wild! Design, decorate, and personalize your scrapbook pages with an extensive collection of stickers, embellishments, and textures. Your unique style is your only limit.

🌈 Endless Inspiration: From vintage themes to modern trends, "Scrapbooking" offers a wide range of themes and templates to spark your creativity. Discover new inspirations every day.

Get ready to embark on a journey that transcends time and space, where creativity knows no limits, and memories are crafted into art. Download "Scrapbooking" now and start shaping your world, one beautiful page at a time.

📦 Unlock your inner artist today! 📦

name: Scrapbooking

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 or later with WDDM 1.0 driver
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: 2 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 or later with WDDM 1.0 driver
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

short_description: Scrapbooking is relaxing game for all lovers of Scrapbooking and handicraft. Make your own scrapbooking masterpiece!
